name: Kevin the last Spaceman
description:
Spaceship 'Blue Edge' is looking for a planet for the human race to move to. Unfortunately whilst finding the perfect planet to live on, a disaster happens - an explosion on the ship wipes out the crew and nuclear pods get scattered on the planet below.

Kevin - who was in charge of the Blue Edge cleaning bots- was on the toilet at the time and this is what saved his life. He is the only survivor.

Kevin now has to put on a space suit and collect the pods that have fallen onto the planet - before they explode.

You are Kevin! Good luck!

Tip: Astronauts fly standing up - and not like superman!!!!
